name: Woolly Fire (Ludum Dare 51)
description:
Woolly Fire

Welcome to the Woolly Fire page, our entry for the 51 Ludum Dare ! 

Every 10 seconds the fire spread so you must think and act fast to protect the citizens ! 

As a player, you control firetrucks capable of fighting the blazes. 

You only have to place them strategically around the map but take care of their limited water tank. 

Left click to select one unit and right click to tell it where to go. It'll then choose to fight the fire or refill if needed on it's own. 

You win when you succeed to estinguish all fire from the board or wistand long enough for the people to evacuate but don't let the fire take down all your units or burn your last city to the ground ! 

Fight long enough to wait for reinforcement !!

Download the game right here (soon) and visit our page from the Ludum Dare website !
